article:
Is Dou Jingtong rebellious ? It looks like it.As Chinese pop queen Wang Fei's daughter,Dou has been living in the spotlight _ she was born, In many people's minds,Dou is still a round--faced girl wearing a pair of glasses.But the 19--year--old has grown into a pink--haired young woman.
Last year,Dou _ to give up college in the US,so she could work in _ .Like mother,like daughter.Dou's musical talents became well--known at the moment she put her songs online four years ago.However the new musician doesn't think she is rebellious.In a recent review with qq.com,Dou said that her parents _ most of her rebellious decisions.For example.with the big decision to give up school,Dou said she talked it _ her parents many times."They made sure that I thought it through,and they _ agreed,"Dou told qq.com."I feel _ that my parents respect my decisions,and I don't have to be rebellious.
She added that giving up school doesn't mean giving up studying." _ is fine,I just feel that self--learning suits me better.I can also learn things outside of schoo1.Perhaps many teenagers _ not know what they really want,but I do.When I made the decision t0 give up school and become a singer,1 was ready."
